attributes.action: Change the age limit for children to go to gyms
attributes.additional_details: I am asking for a change to be made to help children with disabilities who are over weight to be able to access a gym at an age of 7 plus. to access weightloss at An healthy stress free time with there family or trustee . There isn't much out there for child obesity why as a country with free NHS can't we access more for this option it shouldn't just be eat well stick to diets kids with autism can't be made to each vegetables or eat less its traumatic for them so a gym at a suitable young age of 7 should be available.
attributes.background: Change the age limit for children to be able to access a gym especially children with disabilities who are over weight and need this in place

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to offer services to people under the age of 18 are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
